mapper.sql: id, category_id, goods_name, goods_spec, goods_subtitle, goods_no, goods_keywords, goods_brief, goods_price, goods_img, goods_score, goods_deno, goods_number, goods_detail_desc
mapper.select: select id as goodsId ,goods_name as goodsName ,goods_spec as goodsSpec ,goods_price as goodsPrice ,goods_deno as goodsDeno ,goods_img as goodsImg from gow_goods where category_id = #{categoryId}

select id as id ,goods_name as goodsName ,goods_spec as goodsSpec ,goods_price as goodsPrice ,goods_img as goodsImg from gow_goods where 1=1 and ( goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR goods_spec LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR goods_subtitle LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR goods_keywords LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR goods_brief LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR goods_detail_desc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )

SELECT g.id AS id , g.goods_name AS goodsName , g.goods_spec AS goodsSpec , g.goods_no AS goodsNo , g.goods_score AS goodsScore , g.goods_deno AS goodsDeno , g.goods_number AS goodsNumber , g.goods_subtitle AS goodsSubtitle , g.goods_price AS goodsPrice , g.goods_keywords AS goodsKeywords , g.goods_brief AS goodsBrief , g.goods_score AS goodsScore , g.goods_detail_desc AS goodsDetailDesc , g.category_id AS categoryId , c.cat_name AS catName FROM gow_goods AS g INNER JOIN gow_category c ON g.category_id = c.id WHERE 1=1 AND g.id = #{goodsId}
